review: It was not giving me any sound after 3 days had to back on line to try to figure it out . Don't know how i got it to work again not the easiest product but it works.
author: george kieffer

review: Love this little stick. perfect space saver and loads movies quickly.
author: Adriane W

review: I was anxious to setup and test this and was delighted when it arrived early. Packaging was good. Setup was a breeze and it works as advertised. We have one TV with recessed HDMI ports and it will take a right angle adapter to connect to it, but we'll be adding Roku to all 4 TVs soon.
author: jimr

review: Love my Roku. Only problem I have is sometimes it freezes. I can't decide if it's due to my remote or what.
author: S. Hall "iamsamiam58"

review: I love it so much I gave up cable.
author: Yoana Salazar

review: I'm only giving this 4 stars because of its size. Honestly I love Roku, it's a very good product. My only issue with it is the size and the fact that the usb plug is on the end made it so I could not fit it in to my tvs. My suggestion is to buy the 5 dollar 90 degree hdmi adapter. Otherwise, this is a good product, but I like my Roku 3 better.
author: Michael Basso
